Class pHCalculator

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.chemistry.acidbase.pHCalculator
public class pHCalculator extends Object
pH and buffer calculations. All methods use Real for type-safe computations.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    bufferPH(Real pKa, Real conjugateBaseMolarity, Real acidMolarity)

      public static Real bufferCapacity(Real totalBufferConcentration, Real Ka, Real pH)
      Calculates buffer capacity (approximate). ÃŽÂ² = 2.303 * C * Ka * [H+] / (Ka + [H+])^2
